episodes.title: OUT OF CONTROL with Mel Ep.003 Elci McGuire and how 9/11 helped her escape her family cult~
episodes.description: In this episode, Elci McGuire talks to Mel about the years she spent as a child in her family cult. They were in hiding for YEARS and it was only when 9/11 happened that her father decided to bring his family out of hiding and Elci was able to escape. Her story of resilience is inspiring and her childhood tale is compelling. Elci's story is indeed, OUT OF CONTROL! Elci McGuire on X: @ElciMcguire Mel on X: @ThatsFunnyMel Mel's Linktree: https://linktr.ee/ThatsFunnyMel Subject Cameos: The Tuskegee Experiment Hooked on phonics https://www.hookedonphonics.com/ Sylvan learning centers https://find.sylvanlearning.com/ Goosebumps series of books https://goosebumps.fandom.com/wiki/List_of_Goosebumps_books Hamilton College https://www.hamilton.edu/ A Child Called It https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/60748.A_Child_Called_It_ Turpin Family House of Horrors 911 Call https://youtu.be/qsdDTBi9Gtk?si=k-8y593wX_co1GLo Diane Sawyer Interview https://youtu.be/wngB9_6Vqbc?si=c2KOon4nRgx89Z2G What Jordan Turpin is up to today: https://www.insideedition.com/house-of-horrors-survivor-jordan-turpin-talks-trauma-as-social-media-influencer-models-in-stunning David Koresh https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/David_Koresh The Looming Tower https://www.pulitzer.org/winners/lawrence-wright Heart of Darkness https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/4900.Heart_of_Darkness Attached https://www.attachedthebook.com/wordpress/ Pop stars and TRL https://simple.wikipedia.org/wiki/Total_Request_Live

episodes.title: OUT OF CONTROL with Mel Aldo B. Martin and The Reclamation
episodes.description: Welcome to "Out of Control with Mel," a podcast that fearlessly navigates the labyrinthine corridors of human psychology with a dash of humor and a keen eye for the peculiar. Hosted by Mel, a psychology student armed with a BA in Psychology and an insatiable curiosity, each episode is a rollercoaster ride through the realms of coercive control, cults, personality quirks, and true crime. Join us as we peel back the layers of psychological manipulation, exploring the bizarre tactics of coercive controllers and the baffling allure of cults. With wit and insight, we dissect the eccentricities of human behavior, unraveling the mysteries behind the most perplexing cases of psychological influence. But "Out of Control" isn't all dark and gloomy; we sprinkle in a healthy dose of humor to lighten the mood and keep things engaging. From sharing amusing anecdotes to poking fun at the quirks of the human psyche, we ensure that even the darkest topics are approached with a touch of levity. And amidst the chaos and intrigue, we also celebrate resilience and growth. Through interviews with survivors and experts, we shine a spotlight on stories of triumph over adversity, offering hope and inspiration to those who have experienced the darker side of human nature. So whether you're a psychology enthusiast, a true crime buff, or simply someone with a curious mind, come join us on "Out of Control with Mel" as we unravel the enigmatic complexities of the human mind, one intriguing story at a time. _________________________________________________________________________________ Aldo B. Martin is the host of "The Reclamation" Podcast among others. In this episode of "Out of Control with Mel" Aldo tells us of his time in a religious cult. Aldo's Linktree: https://linktr.ee/aldobmartin Mel's Linktree: https://linktr.ee/ThatsFunnyMel SHOW NOTES: Jim Jones https://www.pbs.org/wgbh/americanexperience/features/jonestown-bio-jones/ The Cult Vault https://www.cultvaultpodcast.com/ Steven Hassan BITE Model https://freedomofmind.com/ Janja Lalich https://janjalalich.com/ Mark Vicente https://www.markvicente.com/ KEEP SWEET PRAY AND OBEY https://youtu.be/UbhNxmwh_qc?si=qGytNqcAbYCH9v1O SINS OF THE AMISH TRAILER https://youtu.be/HroeN-lV7oA?si=h1ibeNEo1GfVhiEp

episodes.title: Out of Control with Mel Ep.005 Faith C Echo
episodes.description:
In this episode, Author and Licensed Clinical Social Worker Faith C Echo talks with Mel about her experience with Narcissistic Abuse.
